page.title: 05Derbyshire Fire Service
page.content: Chesterfield Divisional H.Q. is situated on Sheffield Road about a mile to the north of town and is in charge of stations at Clay Cross, Dronfield, Staveley, Clowne, Bolsover and Shirebrook. Only Chesterfield is manned by full-time crews the others being known as Retained or Part-time firemen. There are 80 full-time employees split between four shifts. Eight machines are based at Chesterfield all capable of dealing with a variety of incidents from house fires & road accidents to chemical spillages. Road accidents and people trapped form a major proportion of their work. The number of incidents attended by Chesterfield Station alone is in the region of one thousand calls per year.
